Alright, this build needs no introduction, no fanfare. It's a pure carnage, and ask questions later magical warrior, that will tear-apart everything in his way, especially so in a level 30 PW Or module.

BARD 16/ FTR 4/ RDD 10

RACE: Human
ALIGNMENT: CN (Smite proof) [Any non-lawful]
PLAYABILITY: PvM 1-40

AB: +37/ +32/ +27/ +22 (Greatsword)
AB, Ranged: +21/+16/+11/+6

DMG: 2D6 +20/ 17-20 X2 (Greatsword)

Fire Immunity, Paralysis Immunity, Sleep Immunity, Darkvision 
Bard Song 16/ Day: +2 AB/ +3 Dmg/ +5 AC/ +3 Will/ +2 Fort/ +2 Ref/ +20 Hp's/ +4 all Skills 
Bard Curse Song (17th Lvl): Reverse all of the above for your opponents within 30 feet
